description: Spencer Reed needed some water and Mason went on to fetch it for him. Once he got back to the room Spencer was sprawled out on the bed flipping through channels. They decide to cuddle for one quick second but these two horny boys can't keep there hands off one another.They get into some heated passion and Masons tight ass gets pounded thorughly. Spencer loves to take control and this ride has a very explosive ending.Enjoy!
title: Mason Wyler & Spencer Reed
